about_the_game:
Purchase to get the powerful mage hero: Jennifer, and two of Jennifer's treasures: The Wand of Wisdom, and the White Cloak:.
Jennifer has an extremely powerful AOE magic ability, greatly increasing the team's output.
Background:
Lonely and arrogant female magician. Because of her natural magical talent, Jennifer was afraid, alienated, and disgusted as a monster by the people around her since she was a child, so she devoted all her energy to magic. In her perception, those vivid magic elements became her best friends. Even the most mysterious and elusive element of light and darkness would like to help her. The powerful magical energy in her body even infested her robes, and every inch of dazzling white flashed with the brilliance of magic.
